description: Pic'Assiette is an association based in the suburbs of Montpellier, focused on improving food accessibility and sustainability in a region that is often overlooked by existing initiatives. Pic'Assiette aims to address food issues by combining agriculture, regional planning, and health components. The initiative seeks to raise awareness about sustainable food practices, promote better eating habits, and connect local communities with agricultural resources.Founded in 2010, Pic'Assiette is an association dedicated to sustainable food education, promoting food that is in harmony with the environment, health and the region, like a chain that runs from the earth to our plates.
name: Pic'Assiette
